title: The Trial of Physical Mastery - Korthak's Arena

available_paths.description: Fully accept Korthak's strength and become a physical force of nature
Demonstrate mastery over Korthak's strength while maintaining tactical thinking
Work with Korthak's strength to create new forms of physical excellence

divine_immunity.protection_type: Complete immunity to physical-based divine decay

power_increase.mystical_authority: Recognized as divinely approved practitioner with physical authority
